name: future bot: way back west
description:
this game was created in under a week by a 5 person group for the 2021 riverside game jam with the theme being "out of time"

in this game, you play as frank the future bot who has been messing around with their time machine and got stuck in the cowboy era.

your task is to get all 4 parts back together to get back home to the future, avoid being spotted by anyone from the past to avoid changes to the present and probably about being shot, a disguise would defiantly help with that so grab some wherever you get the chance.
